thought: To fulfill the user's request, we need to define the necessary functions first: a manual trigger, reading Google Sheets data, two aiCompletion actions for classification and reminder generation, Slack message sending, and Gmail email sending.

Define Google Sheets read function to get commercial entries.
Define first aiCompletion action for classification of Description.
Define Slack message post action to send classification results.
Define second aiCompletion action for reminder email content generation.
Define Gmail send message action to send reminder emails.
